column4: Help !!! ...just a noobie here...I installed the gnome destop for UBTU 8 but the mouse is not working...the arrow is there but it doesn''t move...it's an old serial mouse...do I have to install a mouse package? if so which one?
can you get to the mouse properties in preferences?
well, i can't seem to find how to move around with the keyboard
sorry i can't seem to figure how to move around using the kb
i looked for a doc that explains how to maneuver around the windows w/ the KB but couldn't find anything
is it a ps2 or usb?
this machine was running winxp and it worked fine
okay...i'm in holding pattern...i think i'l try changing the irq setting in the bios next
have you tried and editing your xorg.conf
now i'm feeling really dumb...wouldn't know how to edit xorg.conf...i'm stuck in the gui...i don't want to puch the restart button but i think i have to, to reboot...i'll try that website
